# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```
using Threads
function pig_latinify(strings::Vector{String})
    threaded_strings = Dict()
    for i in 1:length(strings)
        threaded_strings[i] = Thread(start=pig_latinify_worker, args=(strings[i],))
    end
    pig_latin_result = []
    for (i,thread) in pairs(threaded_strings)
        while !isfinished(thread)
            thread.wait()
        end
        pig_latin_result = push!(pig_latin_result, i, threaded_strings[i])
    end
    return pig_latin_result
end
function pig_latinify_worker(str::String)
    pig_latin = ""
    vowels = ["a", "e", "i", "o", "u"]
    for char in str
        if isvowel(char)
            pig_latin = pushfirst!(pig_latin, uppercase(char))
        else
            consonant_index = findfirst(!isvowel, str)
            if consonant_index == 1
                pig_latin = char:pushfirst!(pig_latin, uppercase(str[consonant_index]))
            else
                pig_latin = consonant_index > 0 ? str[consonant_index-1]:char : char
            end
        end
    end
    return pig_latin
end
```
